useCase.name: Display All Data of an Application
useCase.trigger: User requests to display all data of an application

mainSequence.step: User requests to display all data of an application
UI activates and displays application data UI
Controller activates and performs doShow() action
Controller fetches all applications from Repository
Repository returns Iterable of job applications
Controller sends List of job applications to UI
UI displays list of applications to User
UI activates and allows User to select an application
Controller activates and fetches data for the selected application
Repository returns job application data for the selected application
Controller sends job application data to UI
UI displays application data to User
